radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe hypoplasia of the anterior pituitary and corpus callosum, with decreased white matter bulk.
Thin corpus callosum, mild generalized lack of white matter, and a hypoplastic anterior pituitary gland with a thin infundibulum.
Small anterior pituitary, thin corpus callosum, dilated horns of lateral ventricles, and decreased white matter bulk with delayed myelination.
Generalized lack of white matter bulk and delay in myelin maturation; anterior pituitary and corpus callosum were markedly hypoplastic.
Pronounced microcephaly with reduced white matter bulk and delayed myelination; severe hypoplasia of the anterior pituitary with a normal posterior pituitary and a hypoplastic infundibulum.
Identical findings to the sister: hypoplastic anterior pituitary and corpus callosum, reduced white matter bulk.
